title: Looking for a Spacious Home? Look no Further!
posting_body: Featuring picturesque, tree-lined river trails and lushly landscaped gardens, Riverside Park offers spacious, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes with gourmet kitchens, private decks and full-sized washers and dryers.
Right on the border of Sumner and Puyallup, Riverside Park is just minutes from schools, shopping, parks and Highways 167, 512 and 410.
Our Chelan 2x2's has a spacious walk in closet and fully equipped with washer and dryer.
Perfect for anyone looking for a place to call home.
If you have any questions about the community please give us a call at
